features: Perfect Choice Before Wear Makeup:As the first step in daily skincare, our toner can meet your skin's hydration needs, prevent skin tightness, balance the skin's pH value, and perfectly prepare the skin for makeup.
Cruelty Free & Vegan: Our soothing toner is free from irritating ingredients,cruely free and vegan,suitable for all skin types.

Deep Hydration and Repair Skin: Say goodbye to dry skin and hello to a hydrated.You can easily experience deep hydration,restoring the balance of oil and moisture and repair your skin with the Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner.
77% Soothing Ingredients: The Heartleaf Soothing Toner is specially formulated to replenish skin's moisture barrier,easily make your skin supple, soft and rejuvenated.
Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner: Our soothing toner enriched with Houttuynia Cordata Extract,which has deep moisturizing and soothing benefits, achieving a perfect balance between oil and water.
body.description: 4 ways to use the product: 1.Moisturizing compress Soak a cotton pad with toner and apply it to the face for 5-10 minutes. Remove the cotton pad and gently pat until fully absorbed. 2.Facial mist Transfer the toner into a spray bottle, making it convenient to replenish moisture to the skin anytime, anywhere. 3.Wiping Moisten a cotton pad with toner and gently wipe the surface of the skin, effectively removing dead skin cells. 4.Toner application Pour an appropriate amount of toner into your palm and gently apply it to the skin until fully absorbed.
